name: part_007
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei  2nd solo live ＂Shout in Crisis＂ [USmUfG_-Sn8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei performs "Stellar Stellar" at her 2nd solo live "Shout in Crisis".
MC section where Suisei changes her outfit and hypes up the audience for the next song.
Performance of "GHOST" during the "Shout in Crisis" live concert.

subtitles.original: 僕だって君と同じ
subtitles.english: Even I'm the same as you

subtitles.original: 特別なんかじゃない
subtitles.english: I'm nothing special

subtitles.original: 変わらない
subtitles.english: I'll never change

subtitles.original: そうさ僕は夜を歌え Stella Stellar
subtitles.english: That's right, let me sing for the night, Stella Stellar

subtitles.original: ありったけの輝きで
subtitles.english: With all the radiance I have

subtitles.original: 今宵僕は ずっとずっと止まない
subtitles.english: Tonight, I'll never, ever stop

subtitles.original: そうさ僕はずっと泣きたかったのは
subtitles.english: That's right, the one who wanted to cry all along

subtitles.original: 僕シンデレラじゃないさ
subtitles.english: I'm not some Cinderella

subtitles.original: 無口な王子様だって
subtitles.english: Even if I'm a silent prince

subtitles.original: 僕は星空
subtitles.english: I'm the starry sky

subtitles.original: だって僕は星空
subtitles.english: Because I'm the starry sky

subtitles.original: なんてありふれた話なんだ
subtitles.english: What a cliché story it is

subtitles.original: 急いで書き連ねていた
subtitles.english: I've been hurriedly scribbling it down

subtitles.original: ノートの隅に眠る
subtitles.english: Sleeping in the corner of my notebook,

subtitles.original: ほんの一シーンだ
subtitles.english: it's just a single scene

subtitles.original: きっとあの星も泣いてるんだ
subtitles.english: I'm sure that star is crying too

subtitles.original: 明日なんて来ないままでいて
subtitles.english: Let tomorrow never come

subtitles.original: このままいて
subtitles.english: Stay just as you are

subtitles.original: その手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Reach out that hand

subtitles.original: 誰かに届くように
subtitles.english: So that it reaches someone

subtitles.original: 本当に大切なものは
subtitles.english: It seems the truly important things

subtitles.original: 目に見えないみたいなんだ
subtitles.english: are invisible to the eye

subtitles.original: そうさ僕は夜を歌え Stella Stella
subtitles.english: That's right, let me sing for the night, Stella Stellar

subtitles.original: 彩のない輝きで
subtitles.english: With a colorless radiance

subtitles.original: 今宵僕は きっときっと止まない
subtitles.english: Tonight, I'm sure, I'm sure I won't stop

subtitles.original: そうさ僕はずっと泣きたかったのは
subtitles.english: That's right, the one who wanted to cry all along

subtitles.original: 僕シンデレラじゃないさ
subtitles.english: I'm not some Cinderella

subtitles.original: 救うヒーローは僕だ
subtitles.english: I'm the hero who saves the day

subtitles.original: You will be the Cinderella
subtitles.english: You will be the Cinderella

subtitles.original: おとぎ話
subtitles.english: A fairy tale

subtitles.original: おとぎ話
subtitles.english: A fairy tale

subtitles.original: そうさ僕は夜を歌え Stella Stella
subtitles.english: That's right, let me sing for the night, Stella Stellar

subtitles.original: ありったけの輝きで
subtitles.english: With all the radiance I have

subtitles.original: 今宵僕は ずっとずっと止まない
subtitles.english: Tonight, I'll never, ever stop

subtitles.original: そうさ僕は愛を歌え Stella Stella
subtitles.english: That's right, let me sing of love, Stella Stellar

subtitles.original: 世界中の真ん中で
subtitles.english: In the very center of the world

subtitles.original: 今宵僕は きっときっと止まない
subtitles.english: Tonight, I'm sure, I'm sure I won't stop

subtitles.original: そうさ僕はずっと泣きたかったのは
subtitles.english: That's right, the one who wanted to cry all along

subtitles.original: 僕シンデレラじゃないさ
subtitles.english: I'm not some Cinderella

subtitles.original: 救うヒーローは僕だ
subtitles.english: I'm the hero who saves the day

subtitles.original: だって僕は星空
subtitles.english: Because I'm the starry sky

subtitles.original: Stella Stella
subtitles.english: Stella Stellar

subtitles.original: みんな！熱くなる準備できてますか！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Are you ready to get fired up?!

subtitles.original: 行くぞ！Shout in Crisis！
subtitles.english: Let's go! Shout in Crisis!

subtitles.original: 画面の向こうの そのまた向こうで
subtitles.english: Beyond the screen, and even further beyond,

subtitles.original: 放たれた言葉たち
subtitles.english: the words that were released

subtitles.original: 殴っても痛まない 楽書き
subtitles.english: Graffiti that doesn't hurt even if you hit it

subtitles.original: 満天の星のように散らばっている
subtitles.english: Scattered like a star-filled sky

subtitles.original: ガラスの破片の上を
subtitles.english: Walking over shards of glass

subtitles.original: 裸足で歩くような痛みだ
subtitles.english: It's a pain like walking barefoot

subtitles.original: 僕はずっと苦しかったんだ
subtitles.english: I've been in pain all this time

subtitles.original: そうだ 僕にとって 正解なんてどうだっていい
subtitles.english: That's right, to me, the correct answer doesn't matter

subtitles.original: この線が確かな誓いだと 自分に決めたなら
subtitles.english: If I've decided this line is a certain oath

subtitles.original: 気付いて 鏡に映った僕もいるわ
subtitles.english: I realized even the "me" reflected in the mirror

subtitles.original: 全部 僕のためにあったのに
subtitles.english: was all there for me, but...

subtitles.original: 気付いたらこの手を離れていた
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, it had left my hands
